title: My valley is changing
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Lionel Hudson, David Haythornthwaite, John Martin-Jones and Roland Beckett
brief_description: Shows how the people of Bougainvillea are reacting to the changes brought about by the mining operations. They are finding it difficult to adapt but copper export means income for the whole territory and provides jobs and training for people eager for independence.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Lionel Hudson, David Haythornthwaite, John Martin-Jones and Roland Beckett
